Name: VALAKAS: Immortal
About the game: One day, while beating up the local gangsters from the area, Valakas comes up with a memory of the greatest war with the powerful army of Detrov. One day, Pena managed to escape from under the table and steal the mask unnoticed. He started a plan to escape to Mars and create his empire there. Many different opponents Unique types of weapons Dismemberment of enemies Explosions Test of dismemberment of opponents. Add more maps Add more opponents
